summary: This mod adds 3 new npc\'s and 5 more marriages such as Narri and Svana(in Riften)! You need ApachiiSkyHair and I would Recommend Skimpy armors mod!
descriptionHtml:
1.Installtion
2. About
3. Information On were Npc\'s are
4. What if I am already married




1. INSTALLATION

REQUIREMENTS:
ApachiiSkyHair( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/ )
The Mod (Here)
I would also recommend getting The Skimpy Armors mod ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3654/? ) 

Manuel:
Step 1. Download the .esp and ApachiiSkyHair  
Step 2. Open files with WinRAR 
Step 3. Find your data folder normally in the steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data
Step 4. Drag all files in (in Winrar window) to data folder
Step 5. Launch Skyrim and make sure in DATA files the mod  is checked!

With Nmm: Click download with Nmm and just check that it is enabled!




2. ABOUT 

This mod adds 3 fully voiced (Meaning they talk) hot npcs (all female)  and allows you to marry Narri(in Falkreth) and Svana Fair- shield(In Riften). All marriages are fully voiced. The 3 new npcs are Emma, Tailia the Whore, and Sasha. Emma is a Redguard, Tailia is a Nord, and Sasha is a Breton. 

3. WERE TO FIND THE NPCS


Tailia The whore:
is located in the The Drunk Huntesman in Whiterun!

Emma:
is located in the Deadmans Drink in Falkreth (also were Narri is)!

Sasha:
is located in the Riverwood Tavern in Riverwood!\\

4. WHAT HAPPENS IF I AM ALREADY MARRIED

To get a divorce in skyrim with out killing your wife you have to type this in to your console in order of top to bottom:

removefac 51596

player.removefac C6472

resetquest 74793

resetquest 21382

setstage 74793 10


PLEASE LEAVE A COMMENT ON HOW GOOD OR BAD THE MOD WAS AND DOWNLOAD THE MOD! THANK YOU!
author: zoofi1
